Text:
Thanks Thumper.
My Nook Loves You.

Why RAR? I see three files: one with the books and what kind of SPAM are the other two? Why should I download ALL the books when only one may interest me? Thanks for the upload but I don't believe your mission is sharing as much as it is trying to profit from the online community that does believe in sharing.

Hello,

This torrent is not created by me... but i have uploader premissions to uplaod here :)

Thanks
Thanks for posting. Anyway to see what is inside the torrent. I used to be able to just pick and choose what books I wanted but now with magnet links I don't know how to do that. TIA.

@press

With a single .rar file it makes no difference, as you have to DL the complete .rar to view it. I find a magnet link gets the file list populated in the torrent client within a few seconds anyway. UL'er has provided links to the current list anyway.

Would it be okay if I requested some books?  I've tried to be patient and wait to see if they appear but I'm not a patient person ;)

If it's possible, can you upload any of the following:

Learning to Swim - Sara Henry
The Red Book - Deborah Kogan
The Breathe Series - Rebecca Donovan
Wife 22 - Melanie Gideon
The Yard - Alex Grecian
Heading out to Wonderful - Robert Goolrick
Diary of a Submissive - Morgan
Alys, Always - Harriet Lane
Paris - A Love Story - Marton

I would be so appreciative!!!
